metadata.description: MAG team's curated collection of Claude Code plugins for modern frontend development

plugins.name: frontend
plugins.description: Comprehensive frontend development toolkit with TypeScript, React, Vite, TanStack Router & Query support. Role-based agents for architecture, development, code review, testing, and UI validation. Includes Figma Make integration for importing working prototypes.

plugins.name: code-analysis
plugins.description: Deep code investigation and analysis toolkit. Features the codebase-detective agent for understanding code patterns, relationships, and architecture across complex codebases.
